skillTree.localised_description: The dominion of Chaos grows larger each day; soon the whole world will be under its sway.
Like all Shaggoths, Kholek is invigorated by the touch of lightning, and the roar of the storm.

effects.description:
Ability: "Storm Rage" for Dragon Ogre and Dragon Ogre Shaggoth units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.
This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +10%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +30%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Kholek Suneater has awoken, and all the world shall tremble at his wrath!
Like all Shaggoths, Kholek is covered by a thick, spiny carapace that is impervious to almost everything.
It takes something the size and strength of a mighty Dragon Ogre to defeat and kill a Giant, and it just so happens that there is one on hand…
A titanic blow delivered by Kholek's gigantic warhammer is tantamount to the tectonic plates beneath the world shifting and colliding.

effects.description: Enables "Dazed" contact effect (reduced Speed and Melee Defence)

Charge bonus: +25% for Dragon Ogres and Dragon Ogre Shaggoths units
	(Lord's army)
Enables "Dazed" contact effect (reduced Speed and Melee Defence)

Attrition suffered by defender: +50% when laying siege or encircling
	(enemy armies in region)

Charge bonus: +25% for Dragon Ogres and Dragon Ogre Shaggoths units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Kholek is abroad once more, with his army of Ruined souls in tow. Beware, world!
Whenever the sky darkens with cloud and thunder rumbles on the horizon, all who know of the legend of the Suneater shiver in fear.

related_attributes.bullet_text:
Daemonic units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is low.
	
	Daemonic units also have:
	Physical Resistance
	 Fear and Terror Immunity

skillTree.localised_description: Every eight generations, when the malevolent moon Morrslieb waxes full in front of its benign cousin Mannslieb, a terrible storm rages through the crevasses and chasms of the Worlds Edge Mountains.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: Kholek was present when the terrible pact with the Dark Gods was forged, pledging their race to an eternity of servitude in exchange for power.

Before a great crack that splits the mountain like a gigantic axe wound, hundreds upon hundreds of Northmen kneel in the pelting hail and snow, chanting sonorously as their captives are sacrificed and hurled into the chasm.
The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The bigger they are, the harder they fall.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

skillTree.localised_description: As dark wings take to the skies and Daemon arrows bear down, the enemies of Chaos know their end is near.

skillTree.localised_description: Breaking bones and ending lives, the armies of Chaos strike like an unholy hammer crashing through their enemies' ranks.

skillTree.localised_description: Hulks of pure muscle, held upright by unsullied hatred, can crush a man with a frightening lack of effort.

skillTree.localised_description: Subdue the enemy with savage fire, as flaming projectiles burn a trail across the sky.

skillTree.localised_description: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

skillTree.localised_description: The worthiest of Chaos' vanguard are blessed with the most elaborate mutations, which also enable them to move faster for longer.

skillTree.localised_description: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

skillTree.localised_description: To devastate one's enemies from afar is the key to controlling the battlefield.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

effects.description:
Unit Upgrades cost: -5% for all units
	(army)

Unit Upgrades cost: -10% for all units
	(army)

skillTree.localised_description: No act of faith can rival reaving the souls of the slain; a dark and twisted offering in honour of the Ruinous Powers.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

skillTree.localised_description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A pungent mix of fell unguents ensures the unholy vitality of one’s minions.

skillTree.localised_description: For one fighting with the favour of the Ruinous Powers, glory and riches come naturally.

Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: Visions cloud the mind, prophesising the arrival of the enemy and uncovering every shadow in which they lurk.

Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: All will bow before such a harbinger of pure, unbridled Chaos, oozing with the energies of corruption.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: Allows the unit to attack and destroy walls in melee. This attribute also adds a  +50% damage multiplier against buildings.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

factionEffects.localised_description: Kholek is a Shaggoth of tremendous age. He is one of the first-born kin of Krakanrok the Black, father of the Dragon Ogres. Where the Herald of the Tempest walks, a raging storm blots out the sun.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Chaos Undivided
Dark Fortress settlement buildings grant additional Dragon Ogre Warband recruitment capacity
Local Warband recruitment: +100% replenishment chance for Dragon Ogres
Empowered by Worship: Kholek gains +5% Weapon Strength, Mass and Armour for each currently vassalised faction
Dark Fortresses: can call for Beastmen hordes

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "The whole world will burn before I rest again."
